name: Interference Key
description: When using Variable Dice to reassign Subsidiary Stats of a 5-star Relic, you can select one Subsidiary Stat to block, preventing it from being enhanced during this reroll.
story:
The integrated circuits within the encryption key are operating at full capacity, emitting interference factors that intercept countless light rays and correct their trajectories. In the information light screen occupying the entire sky dome, a small dark zone appears: a place even destiny must avoid.

"A discordant note emerges in the rapids of probability, refusing to go with the flow, driving itself like a nail into the marrow of destiny."
